keyword: how many calories in a bottle of white wine 750ml
title: How Many Calories in a 750ml Bottle of White Wine?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a bottle of white wine 750ml, including carbs, alcohol impact, per-100ml breakdown, and variations for different types.
h1: How Many Calories in a 750ml Bottle of White Wine?
assumptions: Standard dry table white wine, 12% ABV, no added sugars or flavors.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by wine type, sweetness, alcohol content, brand, and vintage. Check bottle labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A standard 750ml bottle of dry white wine contains about 615 calories, primarily from alcohol and carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Sweet white wine (e.g., with residual sugars like Riesling)
Lower alcohol light white wine (10% ABV)

faqs.q: How many calories in a glass of white wine from a 750ml bottle?
faqs.a: A standard 150ml serving has about 123 calories.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a 750ml bottle of white wine?
faqs.a: Approximately 19.5 g of carbohydrates, mostly from natural grape sugars.

faqs.q: Does white wine have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Negligible amounts: about 0.8 g protein and 0 g fat per bottle.

faqs.q: How does sweetness affect calories in white wine?
faqs.a: Sweeter varieties add 20-50 kcal per 100 ml from extra sugars.

faqs.q: Is white wine lower in calories than red wine?
faqs.a: Similar; both average 80-85 kcal per 100 ml for dry types, varying by ABV.
